underlying_goal: To create a detailed technical specification for improving the paraphrase diversification pipeline.
primary_success: Authored a comprehensive, multi-phase technical specification for paraphrase diversification, incorporating concepts from research papers (Vendi Score, DoAug) and addressing user concerns about complexity and implementation details.
brief_summary: The user requested to flesh out a technical spec for paraphrase diversification. Through an iterative process of research, planning, and user feedback, Claude authored a detailed, multi-phase spec that included measurement (Vendi Score), selection (greedy diversity), and generation (DoAug-style templates), and wrote the final content to the spec file.
